title: I can make music
creator_credit: Tom Zubrycki, Ursula Kolbe and New South Wales Film Corporation
brief_description: Shows various methods of working with children, including the Orff method, which involves young children in actively responding to music. Highlights movement to music and the music of different cultures from places such as Mexico and South America. Suitable for teacher/tertiary level.
creator_credit_for_label: Tom Zubrycki, Ursula Kolbe and New South Wales Film Corporation
